data.title: Drummer/Actor Miguel Ferrer Died
data.meta_description:
Son of Rosemary Clooney & Jose Ferrer
Cousin to George Clooney

Played drums on Keith Moon's solo album, was the drummer in a band with Billy Mumy.
Drummed...
data.text:
Son of Rosemary Clooney & Jose Ferrer

Cousin to George Clooney

Played drums on Keith Moon's solo album, was the drummer in a band with Billy Mumy.

Drummed for Bing Crosby (who was also a drummer)

Acted in a ton of movies and TV shows.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miguel_Ferrer

https://www.yahoo.com/tv/miguel-ferrer-ncis-los-angeles-214200607.html

Loved him in Robocop. Didn't know he was a drummer. I also didn't know Moon made a solo album. I kinda want to hear it.

robthetimekeeper said:

I also didn't know Moon made a solo album. I kinda want to hear it.

The album features contributions from Ringo Starr, Harry Nilsson, David Bowie, Joe Walsh of The Eagles, Jim Keltner, Bobby Keys, Klaus Voorman, John Sebastian, Flo & Eddie (Mark Volman and Howard Kaylan of The Turtles), Spencer Davis, Dick Dale, Suzi Quatro's sister Patti Quatro and future actor Miguel Ferrer.

EvEnStEvEn said:

I also didn't know Moon made a solo album. I kinda want to hear it.

The album features contributions from Ringo Starr, Harry Nilsson, David Bowie, Joe Walsh of The Eagles, Jim Keltner, Bobby Keys, Klaus Voorman, John Sebastian, Flo & Eddie (Mark Volman and Howard Kaylan of The Turtles), Spencer Davis, d**k Dale, Suzi Quatro's sister Patti Quatro and future actor Miguel Ferrer.

I've also previously never heard Keith Moon's solo album until I saw the above post.

Thanks for sharing!

That's sad......I just saw the entire Twin Peaks series on Netflix (at the time it came out, I was a HS senior and college freshman - TV was not high on my list of important things back then!)..........was excited to hear he was going to be on the "new season" of T.P........oh well, RIP.............also didn't know he was a drummer and can't want to check out the Moonie album - what a party that would have been!
